summary: Card/Table View Toggle Feature Testing - ALL TESTS PASSED. Verified mobile-optimized card view toggle for student table in admin panel. Card view is default, toggle works between card/table views, responsive grid layout (1/2/3 cols), all action buttons functional in card view.
passed_tests: View mode toggle renders next to Refresh button with grid/list icons (data-testid: view-mode-toggle, view-mode-card, view-mode-table)
Default view is card view (viewMode='card') - student-cards container found on load
Card view shows: student name, ID (student_number), grade badge, status badge (Editable/Locked), pre-sale toggle, school name, action buttons
Clicking table toggle (list icon) switches to scrollable table view
Clicking card toggle (grid icon) switches back to card view
Card view responsive: grid-cols-1 (mobile 390px), sm:grid-cols-2, lg:grid-cols-3 (desktop 1920px)
Card width on mobile: 366px (full-width single column)
Desktop shows 3-column card grid with proper spacing
Action buttons work in card view: view (eye) opens detail dialog, chat (message) opens CRM chat, lock/unlock visible
View button opens student detail dialog showing: Student ID, Student Number, School, Relation, Profile Status, Pre-sale, Enrollments
Chat button opens Messages dialog (CRM Chat panel)
Lock button present for unlocked students, Unlock button present for locked students
Pre-sale toggle visible in card (shows On/Off state, clickable)
Checkbox selection visible in card view (data-testid: select-student-{id})
Desktop table view shows all columns: checkbox, Student, Grade, School, Status, Pre-sale, Actions
Toggle button states: active button has bg-primary class, inactive has bg-background
